website_summaries.verdict: Despite the possibility of some inaccuracies, this model is worth a look if you need a larger scale that can accommodate up to 550 pounds.
pros: Stands out for having a 550-pound weight capacity, which is as much as 150 pounds higher than many competitors
Looks, good and display is easy to see
cons: Weight readings can be inconsistent, and occasionally are off as much as 10 pounds lighter than expected

customer_reviews.title: Nice width on scale but inaccurate reading!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about the scale is that it is wide. The scale I received is defective. I have a scale that works but I just wanted a wider one. If the scale I received worked correctly I would have been happy with it because it was a nice width to stand on. The scale was off by 49 lbs off my wife’s current weight and my weight was off by 108 lbs! Returning very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High capacity scale
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different scale which arrived defective, got a refund from Amazon and immediately ordered this Taylor scale. Arrived in one day and works perfectly. Published 250kg (500#) capacity, I started at 420# which matched my doctor's scale. Sturdy scale, backlit display easy to read, it holds the reading for a few seconds after stepping off.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J Fascenda Jr

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK, does not always tell you the ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of JUNK, does not always tell you the weight, you have to step off then back on again. The weight you can get off and on several times and never get the same reading.
customer_reviews.author: sam andaloro

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap! Can't stay still enough for it to read the weight. It just turns off. I don't like it at all. Don't waste your money on this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Charles D

customer_reviews.title: Not at all impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used this scale only twice. Second time scale displayed "ERR". I replaced batteries; same results. By the other comments, Amazon should discontinue this item because its defective. Returned and will reorder something else.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Display Is Tough to Read
customer_reviews.text: We just got the scale and our only complaint is that it is hard to read. The back lighting washes out the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: A Person with Reasonable Standards

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale! Easy to read, dependable. Holds a good sized person with no problems. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Tugas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The scales are slim and light weight. And are quick and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Brian goulter

customer_reviews.title: LCD could be better but it still works fine
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it says it's does for larger weight sizes. No problems yet. LCD could be better but it still works fine. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JarretTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For High Capacity Use, Hospital
customer_reviews.text: This works well in our busy prep area, with patients needing to be weighed safely and accurately. Very happy with this product, and we've bought several more for our prep areas throughout the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: MBBrown

customer_reviews.title: Co-branded with "The Biggest Loser"
customer_reviews.text: Product did not arrive as advertised/showng, but instead came co-branded with "The Biggest Loser" program. Also, the scale itself seems poorly constructed; the sheet metal top surface dented the first time I stepped on it (180 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Winston Argyle

customer_reviews.title: not the best thing I have bought on line
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get them to level, on any floor, even tried putting them on a sheet of ply, battery compartment door keeps falling out, allowing the batteries to fall out. I have stepped on these scales four times in a 5 minute period, only to be given a different weight each time, as much as eight pounds difference.
customer_reviews.author: ERNEST TWEDDELL

customer_reviews.title: Product worked fine for 1 day at a time.
customer_reviews.text: used scale for the first day and the next morning the batteries were dead. I replaced the batteries and again the product worked until the next morning when the brand new batteries I put in it were dead.
customer_reviews.author: dwalt623

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big guy and needed an accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and needed an accurate scale, this one worked out great, very accurate, good sized platform to stand on, and it's digital.
customer_reviews.author: F. W. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Works, looks and acts as decribed
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this scale except for the accuracy. It at least 10lbs lighter than the two others at my doctors office.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Lundell

customer_reviews.title: Then use as normal keeping in mind if you're super heavy, stand with toes as far forward as ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scale from a competitor (shame on me!). My advice: Read instructions! First thing after inserting batteries is to step on scale to "set" it, then step off, disregarding weight. Then use as normal keeping in mind if you're super heavy, stand with toes as far forward as possible. I'm near the 500 lb. range and I've found you get a consistent and accurate reading this way. Until I figure out this method, it took so long trying to get a reading it shut off before showinga single weight.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kazee

product_meta.title: Taylor Precision Products 7410 Taylor High Capacity Digital Bathroom Scale, Samsung, Multicolored
product_meta.description: Sturdy. Beefy. Substantial. Just a few key words to describe the new 7410 high capacity scale from Taylor. The oversized 15" x 13" brushed stainless steel platform stands up to daily wear and tear while still keeping its great looks. The raised center section, along with the 2" tall digits with blue backlight, makes it easy to see your weight reading. Most impressive is the 550lb capacity. Finally a scale to use in the privacy of your own home for those with larger frames. This scale runs on 3 brand name AAA batteries (included) and has a 5 year limited warranty. Weight can be displayed in either LB or KG with 0.2 lb / 0.1 kg increments. Even though the scale is large in stature it is very lightweight and easy to carry. The clean, modern lines, rugged stainless steel exterior and extra- large readout and capacity makes the 7410 high capacity scale from Taylor the right choice for everyone.
feature_bullets: 15. 3"x12. 6" Stainless Steel extra wide with large 3. 5"x2" Accu-Glo blue back light LCD
Package dimensions : 14.7 inches (H) x 18.81 inches (L) x 4.7 inches (W)
